column5: I just wanted to update some of the people who were concerned about my health Sunday. On Monday I went to the doctors and found that I had infections in both of my sinus passages from the pine pollen and am now on antibiotics to clear it up. I am feeling fine and working everyday trying to get caught up with all of the plumbing that broke while I was gone. Thanks again for you alls concern and well wishes and for Glen for driving us home even though he had but a nights sleep before he had to drive another 12 hours. I can honestly say that a mans Dawg is truly his best friend.  Art
Glad to hear things are getting better.  Also glad you all had a safe trip.   Pine pollen eh?   Are you sure about that?
Yeah Art....I gave that last half bottle of "pine pollen" to TJ . Glad you guys are ok...and yes, Gawd bless our Dawg.
Glad to hear you're feeling better bubba Art!  There's little that sucks worse than being sick on vacation.
Glad you are feeling better Art. I had a touch of 'pine pollen" rash on Friday night but it cleared right up by Sunday.
Sorry you weren't feeling well, but am glad you're back up and running now.  It was good to see you.  Maureen
I think muskiestudd got into the 'pine pollen' too a bit much. Poor bugger. Glad you guys feel better!
There was alot of that pine pollen floating around... i think Paul stole mine on sunday...
Ya,tell me about it !!!  Good to here your feelin better Art.  Cheers !!
